010package imagingbook.common.interpolation;
011import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
012
013public class BilinearInterpolator implements PixelInterpolator {
014        
015        public BilinearInterpolator() {
016        }
017
018        @Override
019        public float getInterpolatedValue(ScalarAccessor ia, double x, double y) {
020                final int u = (int) Math.floor(x);
021                final int v = (int) Math.floor(y);
022                
023                final double a = x - u; // a >= 0
024                final double b = y - v; // b >= 0
025                
026                final double A = ia.getVal(u, v);
027                final double B = ia.getVal(u + 1, v);
028                final double C = ia.getVal(u, v + 1);
029                final double D = ia.getVal(u + 1, v + 1);
030                
031                final double E = A + a * (B - A);
032                final double F = C + a * (D - C);
033                final double G = E + b * (F - E);
034                
035                return (float) G;
036        }
037        
038}
